hero.text: Galsen DEV is a community that brings together Senegalese developers in order to create an ecosystem that is conducive to creation and sharing among developers and to popularize programming throughout Senegal.

stats.title: A large family
stats.description: Created in 2018, Galsen DEV welcomes new members every day.

first.text: Whatever your problem, together we will find a solution. Whether itâ€™s a semicolon oversight or how to center a div with CSS, the community is there for you.

second.text: The community constantly organizes online sharing and discovery sessions with its members, connect with us to follow our activities.

lastEvent.text: A day of sharing that promises to be an opportunity for exchange and knowledge acquisition, marking the third edition of our Hacktoberfest, coinciding with the tenth anniversary of this global event.
